app.title: ACTIVITY TRACKER
app.description1: A fully local app for tracking activity and measuring productivity.
app.description2: Every X minutes, a lightweight popup asks what you're doing.
app.description3: You can also set an activity manually and only confirm it every Y minutes. All timings and many other options can be adjusted in the app settings.
app.supportText1: If it helped you stay focused or saved you time, you can support this project.
app.supportText2: Even €0.10 per hour saved would mean a lot, but any support is appreciated.
app.helpDownload: Scroll to the download section and focus the Download button.
